publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-3355 Trish Godman: Erskine Hospital-That the Parliament congratulates the management and staff at Erskine Hospital for the creation of the excellent Erskine Bursary Scheme which, in co-operation with other care providers, will ensure that former servicemen and women will receive first-class care in care homes near to their families, friends and communities and believes that Erskine Hospital stands alongside the very best of care providers for service veterans and sets a benchmark for such services in relation to those who have served in the armed forces and who in retirement deserve no less.

S1M-3355 Trish Godman: Erskine Hospital-That the Parliament congratulates the management and staff at Erskine Hospital for the creation of the excellent Erskine Bursary Scheme which, in co-operation with other care providers, will ensure that former servicemen and women will receive first-class care in care homes near to their families, friends and communities and believes that Erskine Hospital stands alongside the very best of care providers for service veterans and sets a benchmark for such services in relation to those who have served in the armed forces and who in retirement deserve no less.
S1M-3355 Erskine Hospital (lodged on 4 September 2002) Donald Gorrie*
S1M-3355 Erskine Hospital (lodged on 4 September 2002) Helen Eadie*, Linda Fabiani*
S1M-3355 Erskine Hospital (lodged on 4 September 2002) Karen Gillon*, Bill Butler*

S1M-3355 Erskine Hospital (lodged on 4 September 2002) Angus MacKay*
